Title: Requires any website or mobile application associated with an electronic benefit transfer system to be offered in multiple languages
Summary: Requires any website or mobile application associated with an electronic benefit transfer system to be offered in over one hundred languages, including both common and esoteric languages.
LawCode: Amd ยง21-a, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to requiring any website or mobile application associated with an electronic benefit transfer system to be offered in multiple languages
